articles.title: Georgetown University student detained by immigration authorities - BBC.com
articles.description: Badar Khan Suri, an Indian academic on a student visa, is being held at a deportation facility in Louisiana.
articles.content:
A graduate student at Georgetown University who is in the US on a valid visa has been detained by immigration authorities.
Badar Khan Suri, an Indian national, is a postdoctoral fellow studying and … [+3163 chars]
